TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FeatureSupport extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport
Public MustInherit Class FeatureSupport Implements IFeatureSupport
public ref class FeatureSupport abstract : System::Windows::Forms::IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供用于从当前系统中检索功能信息的 方法。

span.span: Provides methods for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`static`此类时，查询的类功能的信息的方法实现接口。Use the `static` methods of this class when the classes you query for feature information implement the interface. 否则，继承自并提供您自己的实现。Otherwise, inherit from and provide your own implementation. 此类的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this class, see . 若要获取一项功能的版本号，请调用。To get the version number of a feature, call . 调用以确定是否已安装特定功能或版本的功能。Call to determine if a particular feature or version of a feature is installed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的实现，将查询来功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本，以确定它是否`null`，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 继承自，必须重写方法。当重写此方法时，检查你使用的类参数是对此参数中使用的类相同方法。如果两个参数不同，则还必须重写。

When you inherit from , you must override the method. When you override this method, check that the class that you use for the parameter is the same as the class used for this parameter in the method. If the two parameters differ, you also must override .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Version GetVersionPresent (object feature);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version
public: abstract Version ^ GetVersionPresent(System::Object ^ feature);
abstract member GetVersionPresent : obj -> Version

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.

summary.span: 当在一个派生类中被重写后，获取系统中可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: ，表示系统中可用的指定功能的版本号；如果未安装此功能，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成： 主要、 次要版本号和生成。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的实现，将查询来功能。The following code example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本，以确定它是否`null`，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 继承自，必须重写此方法。当重写此方法时，检查你使用的类参数是对此参数中使用的类相同方法。如果两个参数不同，您还必须重写。请参阅有关此方法的实现。

When you inherit from , you must override this method. When you override this method, check that the class that you use for the parameter is the same as the class used for this parameter in the method. If the two parameters differ, you must also override . See for an implementation of this method.

span.span: A with the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成： 主要、 次要版本号和生成。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". 请参阅包含的功能来确定要传递给的名称的产品文档`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`参数。See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.

span.span: The feature to look for.

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: 表示要查找功能的最小版本号。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 确定系统中是否安装了指定功能的指定版本或较新版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.

returns.span: 如果提供该功能，并且其版本号大于或等于指定的最小版本号，则为 ；如果未安装该功能或者其版本号低于指定的最小版本号，则为 。

span.span: if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.
